name: Murray Michael
description:
Read through till the end of this profile, there is a little brainteaser there, lets see how smart you are to break it.
Each day, I try to make myself a better man than i was the previous day. I also want to be the best father to my kid.
If I take care of myself in this discovery first, then I can give honestly from its overflow. I am thankful, honest, dedicated, passionate, loving, supportive, engaged and well rounded in general.I enjoy giving.
I enjoy bringing home little gifts to the one I love. I also give to my family and looking to give to the woman whose smile and eyes match her soul and spirit. The one who eventually loves me for being me and wants to give back as well. I am into constructions and my job makes me travel alot .Im happy with who I am and I know that true beauty is not without it’s faults. I’m smart enough to know that I don’t know everything. Each morning I wake thankful and try to find the “little signs” during the day that tell me Im on the right path. Attitude is my choice and my choice is being thankful, grateful, positive and optimistic.
Heres a little brainteaser for you, try to break it and send me a message through the means. “kmurraymichael art GeeMhail dort come
